content.rendered:
This simulation game takes you on a Wild West adventure. Mine and manage resources, grow crops and craft goods as you aim to build a thriving city in the frontier lands. Invite friends to become your neighbors to trade and co-op, and progress quicker.

Hunt for gold, unlock new locations, and discover secrets as the story unfolds. Meet a colorful cast of characters, including trappers, Indians and criminals.

Mouse controls. Play full screen for better user experience.
